Akhir Pekan di Cirebon Bertabur Cahaya Lampion
02 Nov 2019, 14:13 by Sudirman Wamad


Foto: (Sudirman Wamad/detikTravel)

Cirebon - Masih bingung cari tempat liburan keluarga saat akhir pekan? Cirebon punya wisata malam, namanya Festival of Light. Festival of Light bisa disebut juga taman lampion. Lokasinya berada di area Grage City Kota Cirebon, Jawa Barat. Konsep taman lampion di festival tersebut terbilang unik, lebih menonjolkan hewan purbakala. Di antaranya, tiranosasurus, brontosaurus dan lainnya. Ada juga lampion berbantuk lainnya, seperti hiu, gajah, tempat ibadah, taman buah, dan lainnya.Pengunjung cukup merogoh kocek sebesar Rp 20 ribu untuk bisa menikmati dan berswafoto di taman lampion tersebut. Namun, saat libur akhir pekan tiket masuk berubah menjadi Rp 25 ribu.


Foto: (Sudirman Wamad/detikTravel)

Festival of Light tak hanya menampikan warna-warni lampion, ada juga wahana bermain lainnya, seperti bianglala, komidi putar, kura-kura, dan sky rink, permainan mirip ice skating namun tak menggunakan es. "Festival of Light kali ini kita menampilkan konsep baru, temanya tentang Jurassic Park. Jadi ada dinosaurus dan lainnya. Ada juga terowongan mulut hiu," kata Marketing Festival of Light Agusman kepada detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Agusman mengatakan pihaknya membuat sudut romantis di Festival of Light, yakni adanya taman buah yang terbuat dari lampion. Kemudian terowongan dari lampu warna-warni. "Ini memang temannya untuk anak-anak. Karena kan menjelang liburan, jadi bisa juga buat wahana wisata edukasi," kata Agusman.


Foto: (Sudirman Wamad/detikTravel)

Ia menyebutkan taman lampion memiliki luasan sekitar 1,9 hektare. Agusman mengatakan dipilihnya wisata malam bertema taman lampion dilatarbelakangi karena masih minimnya tempat wisata malam untuk keluarga. Menurutnya, mayoritas tempat wisata untuk keluarga di Indonesia itu dibuka pada pagi hingga sore hari."Kaya museum, dan lainnya kan itu pagi. Jadi malam hari kita juga sediakan wisata, bisa selfie dan buat edukasi juga," katanya.


Foto: (Sudirman Wamad/detikTravel)

Ia menjamin taman lampion Festival of Light menyediakan ratusan titik untuk berfoto-foto. Rencananya, lanjut Agusman, pada tanggal 8 dan 10 November nanti pihaknya akan mengundang sejumlah band papan atas di tanah air untuk meramaikan festival. "Nanti ada Bagindas, Govinda dan Disco Pantura. Harga tiketnya jelas beda, sekitar Rp 50 ribu," kata Agusman.Simak Video "Rekaman CCTV Aksi Nenek Curi Beras di Cirebon"[Gambas:Video 20detik](bnl/bnl)

Weekend in Cirebon Sprinkled with Lantern Light
02 Nov 2019, 14:13 by Sudirman Wamad


Photo: (Sudirman Wamad / detikTravel)

Cirebon - Still confused about looking for a family vacation spot on weekends? Cirebon has a night tour, called the Festival of Light. The Festival of Light can also be called a lantern park. The location is in the Grage City area of Cirebon City, West Java. The concept of the lantern garden at the festival is unique, emphasizing more ancient animals. Among them, tyranosasurus, brontosaurus and others. There are also other assisted lanterns, such as sharks, elephants, places of worship, fruit gardens, and so on. Visitors simply spend Rp 20 thousand to be able to enjoy and take photos in the lantern park. However, during the weekend the entrance ticket changes to IDR 25 thousand.


Photo: (Sudirman Wamad / detikTravel)

The Festival of Light not only displays colorful lanterns, there are also other playgrounds, such as Ferris wheel, merry-go-round, turtles, and sky rink, a game similar to ice skating but do not use ice. "The Festival of Light this time we present a new concept, the theme of Jurassic Park. So there are dinosaurs and others. There is also a shark mouth tunnel," Marketing Festival of Light Agusman told AFP on Saturday (11/02/2019). Agusman said that his party made a romantic angle at the Festival of Light, which is a fruit garden made of lanterns. Then the tunnel of colorful lights. "This is indeed a friend for children. Because it is approaching the holidays, so it can also be a vehicle for educational tours," Agusman said.


Photo: (Sudirman Wamad / detikTravel)

He said the lantern park had an area of around 1.9 hectares. Agusman said that the chosen night tour with the theme of the lantern park was motivated by the lack of night spots for families. According to him, the majority of tourist attractions for families in Indonesia were opened in the morning until late afternoon. "Rich in museums, and others it was morning. So at night we also provide tours, can take selfies and for education as well," he said.


Photo: (Sudirman Wamad / detikTravel)

He guarantees that the Festival of Light lantern park provides hundreds of points for photos. The plan, Agusman continued, will be on November 8 and 10 it will invite a number of top bands in the country to enliven the festival. "There will be Bagindas, Govinda and Disco Pantura. The ticket prices are clearly different, around Rp. 50 thousand," said Agusman. Watch Video
